lib/hope/components/link_holder/link_holder_policy.h

00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <vector>
00012 #include <algorithm>
00013 
00014 namespace hope::link_holder_policy {
00015 
00016     template <typename T>
00017     struct single_value final
00018     {
00019         using pointer_t = T*;
00020 
00021         [[nodiscard]] constexpr pointer_t get() const noexcept {
00022             return pointer;
00023         }
00024 
00025         template <typename Link>
00026         [[nodiscard]] bool add(Link* raw_link) {
00027             if (pointer != nullptr)
00028                 return false;
00029             if(auto* link = dynamic_cast<T*>(raw_link))
00030                 pointer = link;
00031             return pointer != nullptr;
00032         }
00033 
00034         template <typename Link>
00035         [[nodiscard]] bool remove(Link* raw_link) {
00036             if (pointer == nullptr)
00037                 return false;
00038             if(auto* link = dynamic_cast<T*>(raw_link)) {
00039                 if (link == pointer)
00040                     pointer = nullptr;
00041             }
00042             return pointer == nullptr;
00043         }
00044     private:
00045         pointer_t pointer{ nullptr };
00046     };
00047 
00048     template<typename T>
00049     struct multiple_value final {
00050 
00051         using value_t = std::vector<T*>;
00052 
00053         [[nodiscard]] constexpr const value_t& get() const noexcept {
00054             return value;
00055         }
00056 
00057         template <typename Link>
00058         [[nodiscard]] bool add(Link* raw_link) {
00059             auto* link = dynamic_cast<T*>(raw_link);
00060             return link != nullptr ? add_impl(link) : false;
00061         }
00062 
00063         template <typename Link>
00064         [[nodiscard]] bool remove(Link* raw_link) {
00065             if (value.empty())
00066                 return false;
00067             auto* link = dynamic_cast<T*>(raw_link);
00068             return link!= nullptr ? remove_impl(link) : false;
00069         }
00070 
00071     private:
00072 
00073         bool add_impl(T* link) {
00074             auto&& it = std::find(std::cbegin(value), std::cend(value), link);
00075             const bool found = it != std::cend(value);
00076             if (!found)
00077                 value.push_back(link);
00078             return !found;
00079         }
00080 
00081         bool remove_impl(T* link) {
00082             auto&& it = std::find(std::cbegin(value), std::cend(value), link);
00083             const bool found = it != std::cend(value);
00084             if (found)
00085                 value.erase(it);
00086             return found;
00087         }
00088 
00089         value_t value;
00090     };
00091 }
